sources.title: Woman2Woman
sources.description: Title: Woman to Woman Summary: An amnesiac officer weds a barren socialite and adopts his son by a French ballerina. Directed by: Victor Saville Actors: Betty Compson, George Barraud, Juliette Compton Production Company: Gainsborough Pictures Release Date: 1 November 1929 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 An amnesiac officer weds a barren socialite and adopts his son by a French ballerina.

sources.title: Woman to Woman (1929) BETTY COMPSONüçï DOOMED ROMANCE
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Directed by: Victor Saville
Stars: Betty Compson, George Barraud, Juliette Compton
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLmHgXUJMN1TUzR3YhpzxOuBM6YrZ91UVG
üçï DOOMED ROMANCEüçï TEARJERKERüçï 
Discover a lost treasure of early sound cinema, produced by Gainsborough Pictures and Tiffany-Stahl Productions. Directed by Victor Saville, this romantic drama stars Betty Compson, George Barraud, and Juliette Compton in a moving story of wartime love and sacrifice.

Set during and after World War I, the film follows a British officer who falls in love with a French dancer. Torn apart by duty and fate, their brief romance leaves behind secrets that resurface years later‚Äîthreatening the lives and relationships of those around them. 

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

Be sure to LIKE, COMMENT, and SUBSCRIBE for more rare, vintage films every WEEK on PizzaFLIX.

Adapted from the play by Michael Morton, this screen version delivers emotional intensity through compelling performances and atmospheric production. Betty Compson reprises her role from the earlier 1923 silent adaptation produced in London, which marked Alfred Hitchcock‚Äôs first feature credit as screenwriter, assistant director, and art director.
